exports.name: MiddlewarePipeline
exports.description: Main pipeline class for registering and executing ordered middleware functions with timeout and error handling.

exports.name: MiddlewareContext
exports.description: Context object passed into middleware; includes request metadata and a shared mutable `state` object.

exports.name: MiddlewareFn
exports.description: Function signature for middleware handlers; receives a `MiddlewareContext` and a `NextFunction`.

exports.name: PipelineOptions
exports.description: Configuration options for `MiddlewarePipeline`, including `timeoutMs` and `onError` callback.

exports.name: NextFunction
exports.description: Type for the `next` callback passed into middleware; returns `void` or `Promise<void>`.
